product_name: Outdoor Research Mesh Ditty Sacks - Package of 3
long_description: These convenient Outdoor Research Mesh Ditty sacks are great for organizing all the little things in your backpack. Includes a 3-liter (183 cu. in.) sack, a 4-liter (244 cu. in.) sack and a 6-liter (366 cu. in.) sack. Sturdy polyester mesh construction lets you see what each bag holds for easy retrieval. Drawstring with cordlock provides secure closure.
short_description: These convenient Outdoor Research Mesh Ditty sacks are great for organizing all the little things in your backpack.
